item.title: Action
item.description: FEATURE STATE: Gyroscops 0.1 [alpha] What is it for? Installation Basic Usage Advanced Usage Using expressions Adding logger Adding state An action is a process that enables a task to be carried out before, during or at the end of the execution of a workflow. For example, an action can be used to retrieve or upload files to an SFTP server. What is it for? This package provides a process capable of executing actions.
